memberdef.name: LoomManager

parameterdescription.para: Int | <1> | [0-99] | Device instance number on its subnet
Set(Verbosity) | <1> | {0("Off"), 1("Low"), 2("High")} | How detailed prints to the Serial Monitor should be
Set(Verbosity) | <2> | {0("Off"), 1("Low"), 2("High")} | How detailed to package data

briefdescription.para: Begin Serial, optionally wait for user.

parameterdescription.para: True to wait for serial monitor to open

briefdescription.para: Parse a JSON configuration string specifying enabled modules.

Enabled modules are instantiated with specified settings and added to manager lists for managing
json_config

True if success

briefdescription.para: Parse a JSON configuration on SD card specifying enabled modules.

Enabled modules are instantiated with specified settings and added to manager lists for managing. Json should be on a single line in a .txt file.

True if success

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *module, const char *key, const T val)
memberdef.name: add_data

briefdescription.para: Append to a Json object of data.

detaileddescription.para:
If object is non-empty and contains non-data, will not add and will return false. Only call this after package, otherwise the data will be overriden
module
Which module to add data to (will create if it doesn't exist)
key
Key of data to add
val
Value of data to add
True if success
